sessions.title: All tomorrows browers
sessions.description: The Web's place in history as a flexible & fluid way to store documents is well assured. But in a post-PC world, it's work to do, and it's looking a little out of its depth.The Web's best hope for the future is if we think about it a little differently and admit what we must do to address its shortcomings.
sessions.details: Session By Phil Hawksworth – Phil is a JavaScript developer who has been developing web applications since the late 90s. These days, he’s the Technical Director for The Team.
